game.name: Civilization V - Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Asia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Indus River valley was home to the early Harappan civilization while the Yellow River valley in China saw the rise of the earliest Chinese dynasties. Both these regions are included on the same map. The Cradle of Civilization map packs are Firaxis-designed maps of real-world locations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Indus River valley was home to the early Harappan civilization while the Yellow River valley in China saw the rise of the earliest Chinese dynasties. Both these regions are included on the same map. The Cradle of Civilization map packs are Firaxis-designed maps of real-world locations.
